arts.ttl: How Newcastle and Athletic Club forged a bond that has lasted over 30 years
arts.sum: In Palacio Ibaigane, the regal building in Bilbao that serves as Athletic Club's headquarters, where the contracts were once signed, there hangs a pennant. It is in an office where Howard Kendall once entertained dignitaries over a drink.

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Athletic Bilbao predictions: Magpies set for efficient Euro win
arts.sum: Simon Barlow expects Newcastle to extend their European home dominance when Athletic Bilbao visit Tyneside in Wednesday’s Champions League clash.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Athletic Club – 3,000 fans plan ‘spectacular’ turnout, advance party ‘starting to bring the colour’
arts.sum: Athletic Club are expected to bring around 3,000 fans to Newcastle this week for the clash in the Champions League. That’s according to El Correo, who report than an ‘advance party’ from Athletic have already made the trip to the North East. They state that Athletic fans are ‘starting to bring colour’ to the streets The post Newcastle United vs Athletic Club – 3,000 fans plan ‘spectacular’ turnout, advance party ‘starting to bring the colour’ appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club to be without key man for Newcastle United as crisis deepens
arts.sum: Things continue to go from bad to worse for Athletic Club, as they prepare for their Champions League clash with Newcastle United at St. James Park. Los Leones are due to travel to England today for a 21:00 CEST kick-off on Wednesday night.
